text: hey guys it's angel so lately I've been
experimenting with different types of
flavored milk teas and I love the
strawberry milk tea that I've been
making now the reason why I love this so
much is because it's only four simple
ingredients and it's all-natural
ingredients so there's no artificial
strawberry flavors so it's definitely
kind of like a healthy milk tea or if
you add boba a healthy bubble tea so
with that let's go over the ingredients
the first thing you'll need are some
strawberry teabags
now I'm using this organic sultry
strawberry tea bag by Todd's oh it's
actually a black tea with some natural
strawberry flavors and it literally when
you open the tea bag it smells like a
basket of fresh strawberries so highly
recommend and if you guys are interested
in this tea bag I'll post a link in the
video description we will also meet some
fresh strawberries or you can use
freeze-dried strawberries which I have
here I'm using freeze-dried strawberries
today because I feel like the
freeze-dried strawberries give it a bit
more punch because it's more tart we'll
also need some coconut milk and finally
some organic cane sugar first let's make
the tea I'm using one strawberry tea bag
but if you like your tea stronger you
can always use too next add one cup of
hot water and brew the tea for 5 to 7
minutes after brewing remove the tea bag
and add 1 to 2 teaspoons of organic cane
sugar then stir to dissolve now here I
like to let my tea cool completely or
chill in the fridge before adding half a
cup of ice a handful of freeze-dried
strawberries or you can always use fresh
strawberries and finally topping it off
with 1/3 cup of unsweetened coconut milk
give that a good stir and if you want to
dress things up a bit you can always add
a fresh strawberry wedge on the side and
you're done
all natural strawberry milk tea ready to
serve and drink
mmm this is so good
I hope you guys have a chance to try
this strawberry milk tea recipe because
it is delicious I love how it's
all-natural there's no artificial
flavors it's so refreshing and so light
it's the perfect summer drink I'm angel
thank you guys so much for watching give
me thumbs up if you like this video
recipe and I will see you guys soon bye
you
